means: 严厉责备，痛斥( berate的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He deserved the berating that the coach gave him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他活该受到教练的严厉训斥.

sentence.Network_en: The boss is berating those who were late for work.
sentence.Network_cn: 老板正在呵斥那些上班迟到的员工.

sentence.Network_en: The strategy of berating yourself for past conduct solves nothing and serves to lower your self - esteem .
sentence.Network_cn: 为过去的行为而责备自己的这种方式并不能解决任何问题,只能挫败你的 自尊心.

list.abs: 巨献！ 印尼语情景词典 -  - 中国... ... 包裹 paket 秤重量 timbang berat 快递 kilat.
you in the mirror , berate yourself for gaining weight and then give in to feelings of depression and hopelessness .你照镜子，责怪自己又胖了，然后只能沮丧和无望。
you can berate patients all you want ., 你怎么出言不逊都可以.
禁制令... ... 令节 noble principle;festive season;happy time 呵禁 to berate;to shout loudly 传令 to transmit an order.
可以请你喝一杯... ... 你 thou;you;singular;thine;thy; 呵喝 to berate;to bellow;to shout loudly 嗔喝 to yell at sb in rage.

entry.def: If you berate someone, you speak to them angrily about something they have done wrong.

example.ex: Marion berated Joe for the noise he made.
example.tran: 玛丽昂严厉斥责乔吵吵闹闹。

sentences.sentence: "he deserved the berating that the coach gave him"

auth_sentence.content: Not tough as in berating employees or firing people arbitrarily.

auth_sentence.content: Then, moments later, Correa began berating Uribe, who bristled.
